gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all circuit groups to manage network configurations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of circuit groups with their details.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new circuit group for a project.
gold.ideal: Creates a new circuit group and returns the created object.

gold.user: Support staff retrieving details of a specific circuit group for troubleshooting.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified circuit group.

gold.user: Admin updating the configuration of an existing circuit group.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified circuit group and returns the updated object.

gold.user: Network administrator deleting an obsolete circuit group.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified circuit group and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Network analyst reviewing all circuit terminations for performance analysis.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all circuit terminations with their statuses.

gold.user: Technician adding a new circuit termination for a client.
gold.ideal: Creates a new circuit termination and returns the created object.

gold.user: Network engineer updating specific fields of a circuit termination.
gold.ideal: Partially updates the specified circuit termination and returns the updated object.

gold.user: Admin removing a circuit termination that is no longer in use.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified circuit termination and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Network planner reviewing available circuit types for new installations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all circuit types with their specifications.

gold.user: Admin updating the details of a specific circuit type.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified circuit type and returns the updated object.
